testcase.name: TC20_search_products_and_verify_cart_after_login
testcase.system-out: Given launch browser........................................................passed And navigate to url.........................................................passed And Click on Products button................................................passed Then Verify user is navigated to ALL PRODUCTS page successfully.............passed And Enter product name in search input and click search button..............passed Then Verify SEARCHED PRODUCTS is visible....................................passed Then Verify all the products related to search are visible..................passed And Add products to cart....................................................passed And Click Cart button and verify that products are visible in cart..........passed And Click Signup Login button and submit login details......................passed And Again, go to Cart page..................................................passed Then Verify that those products are visible in cart after login as well.....passed
